main.onecaptiontext: When it comes to Human Resources, I would say that hiring process is usually the first thing that comes to mind. Because assigning the right resource to the right position is the most critical job for a company.
main.twocaptiontext: Hiring a professional isn't everything, but also getting great results from that employee. There are many different and important factors that influence this, from company culture to working hours.
main.threecaptiontext: This title can also be called the dark side of Human Resources management. It is a work department with documents such as collection of personal affairs, preparation of vacation-travel calendars, salary calculation, etc.
